author: b_machuel
title: Great rooms at reasonable price
text:
Ideally located in the theatre district, this hotel is reasonably priced and offers large and comfortable rooms.
The bed was really excellent and the bathroom was bigger than expected, given my experience of hotels in the same neighbourhood.
The regular, complimentary WiFi is sufficient for all uses including music streaming and vod.
The lobby is equipped with a large table that you can even use for a small business appointment at quiet hours.
A very good overall experience, with only two reservations:
- The temperature in the room was too cold for me (temperature outside was below zero Celsius) and I could not turn it up with the air conditioning even when set to the max.
- There is no bar nor restaurant in the hotel. That said, you can have a beer right round the corner or a breakfast right across the street (with a 10% discount).
I recommend this hotel for leisure or business.
